# Drop on Item Index

**API Collection**

This constant defines an index that allows you to drop an item directly on a target.

## Constants

- **NSOutlineViewDropOnItemIndex**: May be used as a valid child index of a drop target item.

## Constants

- **Outline View Button Keys**: These keys are used by the outline view to create disclosure buttons that collapse and expand items.

items.description: May be used as a valid child index of a drop target item.
items.name: NSOutlineViewDropOnItemIndex

items.description: These keys are used by the outline view to create disclosure buttons that collapse and expand items.
